awards: Winner of the first Hackathon Insern 2021
summary: I am a front-end software engineer with 9 years of experience in the IT field, located in Belém, Pará, Brazil. My specialization in front-end development has allowed me to work with a wide range of projects, using technologies such as React, React Native, and Node.js. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to collaborate with renowned companies and high-impact projects, consistently receiving positive feedback due to my dedication and technical skills. As a front-end developer, my priority is to create attractive and functional user interfaces, ensuring an efficient and intuitive user experience. I am fluent in Portuguese and English and have various certifications in the cybersecurity and development fields. I am committed to implementing good cybersecurity practices and have experience in cloud environments. I am constantly seeking new challenges and learning opportunities to enhance my skills and contribute even further to the world of front-end development.
